---
order: 0
title:
  zh-CN: 基本
  en-US: base
---

## zh-CN

编辑整个表格区域。

## en-US

basic demo.

```jsx
import { EditableTable } from 'hermes-react';
import { Button, Input, InputNumber, Select, Radio, Checkbox } from 'antd';

const Option = Select.Option;
const RadioGroup = Radio.Group;
const CheckboxGroup = Checkbox.Group;

const dataSource = [{
  key: '1',
  name: '胡*斌',
  email: 'hyb@alipay.com',
  age: 32,
  country: '中国',
  address: '西湖区湖底公园1号'
}, {
  key: '2',
  name: '吴*祖',
  email: 'wyz@alipay.com',
  age: 42,
  country: '中国',
  address: '西湖区湖底公园1号'
}, {
  key: '3',
  name: '李*嘴',
  email: 'zdz@alipay.com',
  age: 53,
  country: '中国',
  address: '西湖区湖底公园1号'
}];

const columns = [{
  title: '姓名',
  dataIndex: 'name',
  key: 'name',
  width: 150,
  editable: true
}, {
  title: '邮箱',
  dataIndex: 'email',
  key: 'email',
  width: 150,
  render: (text, record, index) => {
    return (
      <span className="ft-blue">{text}</span>
    )
  },
  editable: true,
  formItem: (getFieldProps, id, text) => {
    let fieldProps = {
      validate: [{
        rules: [
          { required: true, type: 'email' , message: '请输入正确的邮箱地址'},
        ],
        trigger: 'onBlur'
      }],
      initialValue: text
    }
    return <Input type='textarea' rows={1}
    {...getFieldProps(id, fieldProps)} />;
  }
}, {
  title: '年龄',
  dataIndex: 'age',
  key: 'age',
  width: 150,
  editable: true,
  formItem: (getFieldProps, id, text) => {
    let fieldProps = {
      initialValue: text
    }
    return <InputNumber min={2} max={100} {...getFieldProps(id, fieldProps)} />;
  }
}, {
  title: '国籍',
  dataIndex: 'country',
  key: 'country',
  width: 150,
  editable: true,
  formItem: (getFieldProps, id, text) => {
    let fieldProps = {
      initialValue: text
    }
    return (
      <Select {...getFieldProps(id, fieldProps)} multiple placeholder="请选择国家">
        <Option value="中国">中国</Option>
        <Option value="美国">美国</Option>
        <Option value="日本">日本</Option>
      </Select>
    )
  }
}, {
  title: '住址',
  dataIndex: 'address',
  key: 'address',
  width: 200
}];

ReactDOM.render(
  <EditableTable 
    dataSource={dataSource} 
    columns={columns} 
    pagination={false} 
    onSaveTable={(data) => {
      console.log('EditableTable 基本编辑结果：', data);
    }}
  />
, mountNode);
```
